title: Bike-Room is the best way to buy pros’ old bikes
content:
Cyclist
Bike-Room is the best way to buy pros’ old bikes

Buying former pro team bikes isn’t just for collectors. It’s the best way to get recently released, high spec bikes for massively discounted prices, while also representing your favourite teams and riders, and there isn’t a better place to do it than Bike-Room.

The Italian brand works directly with all the WorldTour pro teams you see in the Tour de France and beyond, as well as the bike companies themselves to acquire and find homes for previous seasons’ team bikes, and they’re all second, third or fourth bikes, so they haven’t been used and abused. Not only that but all bikes sold on Bike-Room are fully checked over by mechanics, come with a one-year warranty and are shipped worldwide via DHL with super-durable and disguised packaging.

With men’s and women’s team bikes from size XXS all the way up to XXL, there is something for everyone and they’re all at hugely reduced prices.

New addition: AG2R 2022 BMC Teammachine and Timemachine

The most recent additions to the Bike-Room fleet are AG2R-Citroën’s 2022 BMC Teammachine and Timemachine bikes, all equipped with Campagnolo Super Record EPS and Campagnolo wheels. That means the bikes of riders including Larry Warbasse, Felix Gall, Aurélien Paret-Peintre, Oliver Naesen, Lilian Calmejane. And they’re all available for less than half the RRP.

  • Buy AG2R-Citroën’s 2022 BMC Timemachine and Teammachine bikes on bike-room.com
  • Bikes from €6,790 (save 52%); Framesets from €2,990

New addition: EF Education 2021 and 2022 Cannondale SuperSix Evo Hi-Mod

There’s also 2021 and 2022 Cannondale bikes from EF Education-EasyPost and EF Education-TIBCO-SVB, meaning you can get the popular EF bike designs for riders including Neilson Powless, Esteban Chaves, Krista Doebel-Hickok and Veronica Ewers for half the RRP. Yes, they did have first dibs on the Palace bikes, but as you can imagine they went quickly, so keep your eyes out and don’t hang around.

  • Buy EF Education’s 2021 and 2022 Cannondale SuperSix Evo Hi-Mod bikes on bike-room.com

And just a quick look on bike-room.com shows you that’s just the tip of what is on offer. There are bikes ready to go from Astana, Bahrain Victorious, Cofidis, DSM, Jayco Alula, Jumbo-Visma, Lotto-Dstny, UAE Team Emirates and brands including Bianchi, Cinelli, Colnago, De Rosa, Merida, Ridley, Scott and Wilier.

Unlimited options

That’s not all though. Don’t see something that you want? All you need to do is ask. Bike-Room’s relationship with the pro teams means that if you ask for a particular bike or replica, the team will find it for you, even if it’s not already available.

Bike-Room has also recently introduced a world exclusive Bid system that allows customers to place bids on bikes from dozens of brands, so you may even be able to get even more of a bargain.

To find out more about Bike-Room, check out what’s already available, buy your bike or enquire about a bike visit bike-room.com
